description:
There is py26 compatibility code in the libvirt driver to query the console output [1]. We can drop that as we have py27 as minimum. At the same time we can refactor that method a little to make it easier to read.

References:
[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/b2100015ac6f98c68451cb8827687866fe695452/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py#L2701-L2704
title: libvirt: drop py26 compat for get_console_output
